DOC.brief_summary: To compare quality life 's related factor gynecological cancer survivor healthy control .
DOC.brief_title: A Controlled Study Quality Life 's Related Factors Among Gynecological Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: This study use cross-sectional design . By use method purposive sampling , 70 gynecological cancer patient complete active treatment six month recruit oncology gynecology clinic medical center Northern Taiwan area . The 70 healthy control without cancer recruit clinic friend colleague . The instrument include `` Sample characteristic questionnaire , '' `` Short Form-12 ( SF-12 ) , '' `` Medical Outcome Study Sleep Scale ( MOS-sleep ) , '' `` Beck Depression Inventory-II ( BDI ) , '' `` State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) , '' `` Sexual Activity Questionnaire ( SAQ ) , `` The Experiences Close Relationships-Revised ( ECR-R ) . '' The data analyze descriptive statistical analysis , independent t-test , ANOVA , Scheffe 's test , Pearson 's correlation , stepwise regression .
DOC.criteria: Been diagnose cervical cancer , ovarian cancer endometrial cancer , complete six month relevant treatment . 2070 year old Agreed participate study . Combined nongynecologic cancer ( cervical cancer , ovarian cancer endometrial cancer ) patient .
